'''''Like Tears in the Rain''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Underwater Survey Mek]] amidst the group of [[Hunter's Ray]]s in the [[Thalatta Submarine Canyon]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The group of Hunter's Rays can be found between two [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the Thalatta Submarine Canyon.
<gallery>
Achievement Like Tears in the Rain Location.png|Map Location
Achievement Like Tears in the Rain Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* This achievement is a reference to the 1982 science fiction film ''{{w|Blade Runner}}''. It is named after the {{w|Tears in rain monologue|"tears in rain" monologue}}, and the in-game process of hunting down a synthetic imposter hidden amongst organic life forms mirrors the plot of the film.
